Welcome to Sunfox

Sunfox is a new-age medical technology company crafting advanced healthcare solutions for enhanced patient monitoring, improved disease management, and the prevention of heart attacks. Committed to excellence in medical device development, we empower individuals and healthcare providers, fostering a community with shared well-being goals.

Our History

Sunfox was established in
2016, in Dehradun, as a small research lab

Our Mission

To develop advanced and accessible health technologies and deliver them to those who need them.

Our Vision

To build a healthier and more equitable world by transforming healthcare solutions.

Our Success

Emerged as one of the few to secure an All-Shark deal on Shark Tank India, Season 1.

Our Solutions

For Heathcare Professionals

Elevating cardiac assessments by enabling seamless cardiac diagnostics in medical settings.
Learn More

For Patients

Allowing remote monitoring and early detection for patients from the comfort of Your homes

Our Investors/Backers

Evolution of ECG Devices

Willian Einthoven invents the string
galvanometer, a device that can
accurately measure ECG signals

1903

Analog signals were converted into
digital data for more efficient
analysis and storage.

1960s

Wireless connectivity was integrated,
allowing real-time transmission of
data for analysis and storage.

2000s

1856

Kolliker and Muller discovered the electrical stability of heart muscles

1930s

Multi-lead ECG machines were introduced that facilitated better recordings of cardiac electrical activity from different angles.

1990s

ECG devices started becoming more compact and portable, making them more accessible for ambulatory monitoring.

2010s

Portable ECG Devices were
developed, enabling continuous monitoring of heart activity outside clinical settings.
